name: Mask (vngu)
description:
A game about the risks and rewards of revealing yourself to others.
Made for the Games For Change jam with the participation of  Unity Technologies.

Do you have the courage to talk to people without your mask ?

Fill your courage bar by talking to people and see what their reactions are !
But not everyone is friendly... so reveal your true self carefully.

Controller :
Move - WASD (Be carefull to not bump into anyone)
Talk - Left Click on NPC
Change Mask - Left Click on mask to remove a layer
                          Right Click on mask to add a layer

Credits :
Game programmer : Virginie Nguyen
Game Design & Narration : Sarah Granoff
Game Design & Level Design : Tassos Karras
Art from Kenney
Music Time Crawler - Mt Fuji (licensed Under CC)
